Elgin.East Dundee, Illinois:
East Dundee is a village in Kane County with a small section in Cook County. The population was 2,860 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
East Dundee is located at 42°06′07″N 88°16′13″W.
According to the 2010 census, East Dundee has a total area of 2.969 square miles (7.69 km2), of which 2.73 square miles (7.07 km2) (or 91.95%) is land and 0.239 square miles (0.62 km2) (or 8.05%) is water.
